data.actual_result: The bot continues playing audio, but the indicator stops showing. The indicator reappears if the bot stops playing audio and then starts again.
data.expected_result: The bot continues playing audio and the green circular outline indicator remains unchanged
data.short_description: The audio indicator stops showing for a bot when it leaves a voice channel in a different mutual server
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel and have a bot join the voice channel and start playing audio - Have the bot join a voice channel in a different server that you share with it - Have the bot leave the voice channel in the other server
